traits.name: Knightly Virtue
entries: The knight has one of the following traits, depending on the court it serves:

items.name: Courage (Embereth)
entries: The knight has advantage on Wisdom checks and Wisdom saving throws.

items.name: Knowledge (Vantress)
entries: The knight has advantage on Intelligence checks and Intelligence saving throws.

items.name: Loyalty (Ardenvale)
entries: The knight has advantage on Charisma checks and Charisma saving throws.

items.name: Persistence (Locthwain)
entries: The knight has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

items.name: Strength (Garenbrig)
entries: The knight has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

actions.name: Lance
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) radiant damage.
